topic.title: How can hind my IP?
topic.body: How i can hind my IP if i don't used VPN or hostpot shield?

topic.title: Retroshare
topic.body: How to find some group or get some friends on Retroshare?

1552994800_1Gn3VCPeEdJaKUhFQKaJzS8DmdqnC.body:
> [fuckthepolice](#comment_2_1FRx7BoFqFAbwqRbQzHPy4gqVDT4aezhtP): TorDisable: Don't connect to peers on Tor networkEnable: Only use Tor for Tor network peers--> Always: Use Tor for every connections to hide your IP address (slower)

Yeah...thanks you <3
